items.sentence: Tom put his career on the back burner and became a house husband, to enable Mary to pursue her career.
I think all the coffee that I\'ve been drinking in the afternoon is why I haven\'t been sleeping well.
I was just wondering if I could borrow three hundred dollars from you. I can pay you back next Monday.
Tom is such a picky eater that he'll diligently pick the stringy pith from an orange before eating it.
Tom went over to where Mary was sitting and gave her the envelope that John had given him to give her.
